home.description: I build fast and modern web apps using React, TailwindCSS, and modern tools. I care about clean code and user experience.

projects.taskHub: A full-stack task management app with user authentication, drag-and-drop interface, and MongoDB-based persistence. Built with React, TypeScript, Node.js, and Tailwind.
projects.mgk: A minimal and responsive gallery of cute cats built with React and Tailwind. Features a clean UI and light interactivity.
projects.school: A school journal web app where students and teachers can interact. Includes student lists, grades, and class info. Backend built with Node.js and MongoDB.
